quotes.quote: The greatest gift you can give to somebody is your own personal development.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Change is inevitable but personal growth is a choice.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: Always concentrate on how far you've come.
You must always do your best every day, even when you are feeling defeated. Always do your best.
The best thing I ever did was become more low-key and focus on myself.
There is always room for improvement.
Be motivated enough to set goals and disciplined enough to achieve them.
It's ok to put yourself first.
Be strong, be who you are and fight for your identity, fight for who you really are.
The more you nurture your self-respect, the sooner it will grow into self-confidence.
Good things come from change, and change comes from choice.
Obstacles don't have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don't turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: One of the greatest regrets in life is being what others would want you to be, rather than being yourself.
The Universe will never let you down. You're already on your way to where you need to be.
If you want the grass to be greener, you have to water it.
You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem and smarter than you think.
It's time to forget what you feel and remember what you deserve.
You have the courage and strength to overcome any obstacles. Believe in yourself.
You can't rush something you want to last forever.
Never regress, only progress.
Anyone can tell you to move on, you have to want to move on before you make any progress.
When you're in a rut, you have to question everything except your ability to get out of it.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: Never neglect an opportunity for self-improvement.
Step so far outside your comfort zone that you forget how to get back.
Wisdom is knowing the difference between when to forge forward and when to find a new path.
Your excuses are something you tell yourself so that when you aren't progressing, it isn't your fault.
Don't go on discussing what a good person should be. Just be one.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: If you feel like giving up, look back at how far you've come.
Let go of the need to change or control others. Change your focus to developing yourself.
You know what you need to do. Trust in yourself to accomplish it.
You are stronger than you know. Believe in yourself and push through the challenges. The reward on the other side is worth it.
You should have two goals in life. The first is to find your talent. The second is to figure out how to share it.
Each person's task in life is to become an increasingly better person.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: You will never change your life until you change something you do daily.
quotes.author: Mike Murdock

quotes.quote: Just learn from your mistakes.. and forgive yourself.. and better yourself.
We do today what they won't, so tomorrow we can accomplish what they can't.
quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

quotes.quote: When everything seems like an uphill struggle, just think of the view from the top.
Growth and change go hand in hand. You have to be willing to change if you want to grow.
All growth depends upon activity. There is no development physically or intellectually without effort, and effort means work.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Water yourself daily and allow yourself room to grow.
Don't ever stop believing in your own transformation. It is still happening even on days you may not realize it or feel like it.
No one else can determine your future. It's in your hands; it always was.
Keep beginning, as many times as you need to, until you reach your dreams.
You can handle a lot more of the unknown than you think you can.
Strive to be a better version of yourself.
Growing can sometimes be painful, but so is staying the same.
That final push might just be the one that helps you reach the top of the mountain.
The only thing you can do in this life is pursue your passions, celebrate your bloopers and never stop following your fear.
quotes.author: Grace Helbig

quotes.quote: Accountability is the glue that ties commitment to results.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: You're strong. You're brave. You're capable. You've got this!
Anything that doesn't grow dies.
Life challenges are opportunities for growth.

Take the first step towards a more empowered self with the Motivation App. Start your day with inspiring self-development quotes and stay motivated on your path to personal growth. Download the app here and unlock your full potential today.
